description: Squarefree kernel of A002944(n), the LCM of binomial coefficients {C(n,0),...,C(n,n)}.
comments: Also squarefree kernel of A001142; row products in table A256113. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 21 2015
example: a(7)=105 because LCM[1,7,21,35]=105 is already squarefree.
author: _Labos Elemer_, Aug 07 2000
